title: Peach Salad With Blue Cheese & Toasted Almonds
summary: Peach Salad With Blue Cheese & Toasted Almonds might be just the main course you are searching for. One serving contains 439 calories, 20g of protein, and 25g of fat. This gluten free recipe serves 1 and costs $6.34 per serving. 8 people were impressed by this recipe. If you have cheese, peach, balsamic reduction, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the peach you could follow this main course with the Peach Pie as a dessert. With a spoonacular score of 96%, this dish is great. Try Grilled Peach Salad with Toasted Pecans, Blue Cheese and Honey Balsamic Syrup, Beet Salad with Goat Cheese and Toasted Almonds, and Butternut Squash and Spelt Salad with Goat Cheese and Toasted Almonds for similar recipes.
